name: Danny
comment: Study attitude is good, but the grade is normal, please work harder, you can do better!

name: Warren
comment: Often get good score, especially in math, very smart, don’t forget to protect your eyes ~

name: Jack
comment: Got good grade in English, but failed all the rest of the subjects, spend more time on other subjects!

name: Kevin
comment: Too naughty , like sports and chemistry, but can’t concentrate on study!

name: Adam
comment: It's good to ask question, but you have too many questions, can you think before you ask next time?

name: Vivian
comment: Has excellent hands-on skills, but too naughty, isn't it good to be quieter?

name: Sophia
comment: Your dream is to travel around the world, but first you have to finish your studies, I believe you can!

name: Dora
comment: You have to pay attention to sun protection, you are too often sunstroke, be careful!~

name: Alice
comment: You play piano beautifully and do well in your studies, keep it up!

name: Bella
des:
I heard that the teachers here are humorous, and there is a lot of time after school
 I want to enter school as soon as possible
comment: Simple, kind-hearted child with good academic performance and cute looks, loved by all people!

name: Paul
des:
I can enroll as long as you don't look for trouble with me
 If you want me to join, please hurry up, my time is precious!
comment: Hey, this is not a talent show, please don't do that, take out your homework and take a look!

name: Baby Chicken
des:
I'm still a baby, little babies don't have to go to class, I don't want to go to class! 
 Don't ever drag me into school!
comment: Cluck, cluck, please, baby chicken, aren't you hot?

name: Super Tom
des:
Where is the little monster? 
 dong... dong... dong... snap! 
 See what I can do?
comment: Please don't bully other kids, there are no little monsters here, the world is peaceful!

name: Prince Gidan
des:
The little prince is here, why don't you come and greet him? 
 ...this ...Is it because I didn't bring enough money?
comment: In school, all people are equal, there is no such thing as a prince, please communication with others.

name: Anne
des:
hi, I am a little princess and I want to make more friends at school. 
 Her family is too strict, she has no friend
comment: Enthusiastic and has no princess temper at all, hands-on ability is strong, very cute, cheers!

name: Scooby
des:
I know everything and can do anything! 
 I like the promotion of culture, school is a good place to promote! I want to come!
comment: You know a lot of things and are happy to share them, but when others don't want to know, you need learn to be silent.

name: Taylor
comment: You are a very delicate child, not only can you take care of yourself, but you can also help the teacher, good!~
